title: Permit
description: A permit issued by an organization, e.g. a parking pass.

allOf.description: A utility class that serves as the umbrella for a number of 'intangible' things such as quantities, structured values, etc.

issuedBy.description: The organization issuing the ticket or permit.

issuedThrough.description: The service through with the permit was granted.

permitAudience.description: The target audience for this permit.

validFor.description: The duration of validity of a permit or similar thing.

validFrom.description: The date when the item becomes valid.

validIn.description: The geographic area where a permit or similar thing is valid.

validUntil.description: The date when the item is no longer valid.
